overview: Kort Om David Gray - Live - Sail Away - White Ladder - Late Night Radio - Faster Sooner Now - Lead Me Upstairs - Babylon - The Light - We're Not Right - Flame Turns Blue - This Years Love - Coming Down - Shine - A Century Ends - My Oh My; Wisdom - Silver Lining - Please Forgive Me
tagline: Featuring 17 Songs Recorded At The Point, Dublin Plus The Film 'UP TO A POINT'
title: David Gray - Live
